channel.title: Tops on EvanZhao
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on EvanZhao

item.description: Evan Zhao is a software developer.His favorite programming language is Python and Java.But now, what he wants to learn is Golang. Throughout his career, he has built a number of… oh, wait, his career has just begun, then let’s skip this paragraph. He loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including MIT App Inventor(a web for build app), nbgrader(a system for assigning and grading notebooks), jupyterhub(multi-user server for Jupyter notebooks ), etc
Machine learning学习笔记 Coursera 在线课程 Machine learning 笔记 讲师: 吴恩达(Andrew Ng) 课程地址：https://www.coursera.org/learn/machine-learning
